reviews.text: I got the bartholio American-Italian pizza and my husband got the Cotto and Fungi Classic Italian Pizza Rossa. Both pizzas were SO delicious and light. The owners explained that many of the ingredients are imported from Italy. They also had fresh basil plants inside the van. The owners were super nice and easy to talk to! Overall, the food was delicious, worth the price, the atmosphere was cute, the owners are super approachable and sweet! 1000000/10 üöÄ

I had a Italian boyfriend and i remember perfectly how the original itlaian pizza smells and test. After many years without testing it, i can say i did recognise it when i tried some of these pizzas. Amazing!! There is no words to express how difficult it's to find a good testure, flavour, and healthy pizza around USA. So, thanks again to the team, all the workers, and effort to bring Italy to United States. üíûüí™üèΩ
we love this pizza van!  Italian or American style pizza, desserts and everything in the same place!  We love Tiramisu!!  Anyone who stops by to eat, I assure you, you will not regret it!

Absolutely delicious pizza! I have a moderate gluten intolerance, so I normally avoid traditional pizza and eat gluten free. Because the flour is imported from Italy and the ingredients are so fresh, I gave it a try. I felt fine after eating and experienced none of my usual symptoms when I get 'glutened'. An amazing light, fluffy, chewy, delicious crust. The pesto was flavorful and well balanced. The fresh tomatoes were the prefect pop of acid to finish it off. 1000% recommend!

I got the Burrata Pizza and Tiramisu, I added some salt and pepper to the pizza and it was absolutely delicious! I will definitely be going back to try more of their menu. Got the pizza and tiramisu for two people it was the perfect amount of food.

issues: Mobile performance data unavailable - API configuration required
recommendations: Configure Google PageSpeed Insights API for mobile analysis
Test website on mobile devices manually

Spent a week in Provo on a job and discovered this place while browsing for local eateries. It's a food van, so it can be a little difficult to locate, but your effort will be rewarded.

Had a Margherita and buddy ordered a Bartholio. Both were excellent. Fresh-made dough, real mozz, deliciously tart tomato sauce, etc. This is a pizza that you'll look forward to eating the crust!

This is one of the best pizzas I have eaten. I am very picky when it comes to my pizza, mainly because of the sauce.

I tried the burrata, bartholio, corto y fungi, and all were so delicious! You can definitely taste the homemade and love that is put into the food. 1000/10 recommend!

Absolutely delicious pizza! I have a moderate gluten intolerance, so I normally avoid traditional pizza and eat gluten free. Because the flour is imported from Italy and the ingredients are so fresh, I gave it a try. I felt fine after eating and experienced none of my usual symptoms when I get 'glutened'. An amazing light, fluffy, chewy, delicious crust. The pesto was flavorful and well balanced. The fresh tomatoes were the prefect pop of acid to finish it off. 1000% recommend!
Love the quality of the food and the atmosphere provided
By far the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had. The crust was amazing and the toppings were so fresh. I can‚Äôt wait to eat here again.

detailedReviews.author: darrellid
detailedReviews.text:
Spent a week in Provo on a job and discovered this place while browsing for local eateries. It's a food van, so it can be a little difficult to locate, but your effort will be rewarded.

Had a Margherita and buddy ordered a Bartholio. Both were excellent. Fresh-made dough, real mozz, deliciously tart tomato sauce, etc. This is a pizza that you'll look forward to eating the crust!

detailedReviews.author: Maria Esparza
detailedReviews.text:
This is one of the best pizzas I have eaten. I am very picky when it comes to my pizza, mainly because of the sauce.

I tried the burrata, bartholio, corto y fungi, and all were so delicious! You can definitely taste the homemade and love that is put into the food. 1000/10 recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Anne Bailey Westbroek
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely delicious pizza! I have a moderate gluten intolerance, so I normally avoid traditional pizza and eat gluten free. Because the flour is imported from Italy and the ingredients are so fresh, I gave it a try. I felt fine after eating and experienced none of my usual symptoms when I get 'glutened'. An amazing light, fluffy, chewy, delicious crust. The pesto was flavorful and well balanced. The fresh tomatoes were the prefect pop of acid to finish it off. 1000% recommend!

detailedReviews.text: Love the quality of the food and the atmosphere provided

detailedReviews.text: Found this food truck at the Draper farmers market. This is the best pizza I have had since being in Italy! üáÆüáπ these guys were super friendly and super accommodating, and the food is phenomenal. I would definitely recommend these guys to anyone. detailedReviews.author: Maverick Darling
detailedReviews.text: I got the Burrata Pizza and Tiramisu, I added some salt and pepper to the pizza and it was absolutely delicious! I will definitely be going back to try more of their menu. Got the pizza and tiramisu for two people it was the perfect amount of food.

detailedReviews.text: My wife and I really enjoy Da Ramalli pizza.  Great pizza with quick service.  Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Daniela Arancibia
detailedReviews.text: We tried the panuozzo. We bought the Amandina and Giorgio. They were DELICIOUS! You can tell they use fresh ingredients, and that is made from scratch, because everything tasted like fresh. The price is very affordable, and the size is big enough for two portions. I recommend this place 100%. You have to try it, you won't regret it.

detailedReviews.author: Kindra Skolmoski
detailedReviews.text: First time eating here and wow it was amazing! I'm instantly hooked. The pizza and service was amazing. We'll definitely be back

detailedReviews.author: Marc Whiting
detailedReviews.text: Pizza sounded good, food truck looks clean/nice, thought why not. Wow!!! Just wow!!! The pizza was absolutely amazing, so glad we stopped in and we will definitely be back! The two running the truck are also very nice and made great suggestions for us. This is definitely the place to get pizza and tiramisu!! Keep up the amazing work!!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.9/5 rating across 35 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the authentic Italian taste and quality of the ingredients, with many noting that the ingredients are imported from Italy, resulting in a delicious and light pizza experience. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The friendly and approachable nature of the owners and staff is frequently mentioned, enhancing the overall dining experience and creating a welcoming atmosphere. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The pizza's crust is consistently praised for being light, fluffy, and delicious, even appealing to those with gluten sensitivities. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Lack of awareness about the ambiance and unique setting (cute little pizza truck) - social media marketing can improve this area
Competition/discovery issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Potential for negative reviews due to food quality (doughy pizza bottom) - review management can address this concern
